about_the_game: Build, Fight, Craft, and Transform your world while harnessing it's resources to become more powerful. Use a variety of weapons, from swords to magic spells, to fight off the darkness that plagues this world. Fight tons of bosses, both dark and light, to return balance to this land.
detailed_description: Build, Fight, Craft, and Transform your world while harnessing it's resources to become more powerful. Use a variety of weapons, from swords to magic spells, to fight off the darkness that plagues this world. Fight tons of bosses, both dark and light, to return balance to this land.
name: Pickscover 2 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Build, Fight, Craft, and Transform your world while harnessing it's resources to become more powerful. Use a variety of weapons, from swords to magic spells, to fight off the darkness that plagues this world. Fight tons of bosses, both dark and light, to return balance to this land.
